languages.text: "Я уверен, что образ священного Патента впечатляет куда сильнее, чем фарс с обливанием кровью, и Вольный Торговец изберет верный путь".
languages.translation_comment:
The RT has been initiated as a Bloodwarden, an honourary member of the death cult.
Idira: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"

languages.text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."
languages.translation_comment:
The RT has been initiated as a Bloodwarden, an honourary member of the death cult.
Idira: "So, the Lord Captain is indulging the spinners now? Is {mf|he|she} going to start cutting people left and right because 'the Undying One gave {mf|him|her} a sign'?"
languages.original_text: "Я уверен, что образ священного Патента впечатляет куда сильнее, чем фарс с обливанием кровью, и Вольный Торговец изберет верный путь".

"I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

languages.text: 「聖なる令状の威厳の方が、大量の血のもとで行われる滑稽な儀式よりも強い印象を与えると俺は確信している。ローグトレーダーは正しい道を選ぶだろう」
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる令状の威厳の方が、大量の血のもとで行われる滑稽な儀式よりも強い印象を与えると俺は確信している。ローグトレーダーは正しい道を選ぶだろう」

languages.text: "Ich bin sicher, der Anblick des heiligen Handelsbriefs hinterlässt einen größeren Eindruck als irgendein lächerliches Ritual, das mit Unmengen Blut durchgeführt wird. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wird den richtigen Weg wählen."
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin sicher, der Anblick des heiligen Handelsbriefs hinterlässt einen größeren Eindruck als irgendein lächerliches Ritual, das mit Unmengen Blut durchgeführt wird. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wird den richtigen Weg wählen."

languages.text: «Seguro que la imagen de la sagrada Patente deja mayor impresión que un ritual absurdo celebrado bajo un torrente de sangre. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tomará la decisión adecuada».
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: «Seguro que la imagen de la sagrada Patente deja mayor impresión que un ritual absurdo celebrado bajo un torrente de sangre. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tomará la decisión adecuada».

languages.text: “我敢肯定，比起下面那些血流成河的仪式，神圣授状的感召是不言而喻的。行商浪人肯定会选择正确的道路。”
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: “我敢肯定，比起下面那些血流成河的仪式，神圣授状的感召是不言而喻的。行商浪人肯定会选择正确的道路。”

languages.text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin görülmesinin, kanlar içinde icra edilen gülünç bir ayinden çok daha güçlü bir etki bırakacağına eminim. Hür Tacir, doğru yolu seçecektir."
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Ruhsatname'nin görülmesinin, kanlar içinde icra edilen gülünç bir ayinden çok daha güçlü bir etki bırakacağına eminim. Hür Tacir, doğru yolu seçecektir."

languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

languages.text: « Je ne doute pas un instant que la vue de la lettre de marque sacrée fasse plus forte impression qu'un rituel grotesque exécuté dans un flot de sang. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} saura choisir la bonne voie. »
languages.original_text: "I am certain that the sight of the sacred Warrant leaves a stronger impression than some ludicrous ritual performed under a stream of blood. The Rogue Trader will choose the right path."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne doute pas un instant que la vue de la lettre de marque sacrée fasse plus forte impression qu'un rituel grotesque exécuté dans un flot de sang. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} saura choisir la bonne voie. »
